act_info.full_title: Crown Agency Act, R.S.O. 1990, c. C.48

content.content: 1 In this Act, “Crown agency” means a board, commission, railway, public utility, university, manufactory, company or agency, owned, controlled or operated by Her Majesty in right of Ontario, or by the Government of Ontario, or under the authority of the Legislature or the Lieutenant Governor in Council.  R.S.O. 1990, c. C.48, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1 In this Act,

“Crown agency” means a board, commission, railway, public utility, university, manufactory, company or agency, owned, controlled or operated by Her Majesty in right of Ontario, or by the Government of Ontario, or under the authority of the Legislature or the Lieutenant Governor in Council.  R.S.O. 1990, c. C.48, s. 1.

content.content: 2 A Crown agency is for all its purposes an agent of Her Majesty and its powers may be exercised only as an agent of Her Majesty.  R.S.O. 1990, c. C.48, s. 2. 3 Repealed:  1998, c. 15, Sched. E, s. 8. Section Amendments with date in force (d/m/y) 1998, c. 15, Sched. E, s. 8 - 01/04/1999 ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
2 A Crown agency is for all its purposes an agent of Her Majesty and its powers may be exercised only as an agent of Her Majesty.  R.S.O. 1990, c. C.48, s. 2.

3 Repealed:  1998, c. 15, Sched. E, s. 8.
